duties_responsibilities.duty: Work on multiple clinical trials concurrently, handling coordination and communication with research team and subjects.
Prepare for patient visits, working alongside medical staff and ensuring all protocols are followed.
Manage study documentation and regulatory binders, ensuring compliance with industry standards and protocols.
Obtain informed consent from potential study subjects, ensuring understanding and compliance with study requirements.
Schedule patients for upcoming visits, ensuring proper coordination with medical staff and adherence to study protocols.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in a related field
